events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. Please advise on the next steps.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear you got the wrong item. I’ll be happy to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to help us process your refund quickly?
Thank you for your response. My order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo of the wrong item sent to me.
We have reviewed your case and will issue a full refund immediately. Please keep the incorrect item, no need to return it.
Thank you for the quick resolution! I appreciate not having to return the item and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund has been processed on our side and you should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As we have not heard back, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting customer support and have a great day!
